{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=GT724WG |revision=R |asin=B0017KG70O |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=EoL |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_date=01/12/2007 |fcc_id=LNQGT724WG |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7200;TNETD7200ZDW; |cpu1_cspeed=212 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K8D3216UBC-PI07 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16FS-75B |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=TNETW3422 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:15:05 |oui_eth=00:15:05 }} {{TagLine|Wireless DSL Modem}} :[http://www.actiontec.com/support/product_details.php?pid=73 Support page]
"Actiontec" and "05773AD" are silkscreened on the board. :CPU is part [[Texas Instruments]] TNETD7200ZDW.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/gt724wg On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.routertech.org/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=5135 Specs mentioned on routertech.org forums]
The label on the bottom of (at least some of) the devices :states the model as GT724-WG. It also states the default SSID is '''Actiontec'''.
===See also=== :;[[Actiontec]] *[[Actiontec GT701D]] (No wireless) *[[Actiontec GT701WG]] (Wireless) *[[Actiontec GT704]] *[[Actiontec GT704WG]] *[[Actiontec GT704WG Rev. B]] *[[Actiontec GT704WGRV]] *[[Actiontec GT724R]] (No wireless) *[[Actiontec GT724WGR]] (Wireless) *[[Actiontec GT784WN]] *[[Actiontec GT784WNV]]
